message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider selling the product for $10500?

I understand that you're looking to keep your expenses within a budget, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $10800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this time.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10600 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you in the middle. I can offer the product to you for $10900. This is the best price I can offer at this time, considering its value to me.
I appreciate your effort in adjusting your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $10750 for the product.
